HandleLinkDesc:
If enabled, the download link will be handled by the downloader.
You can hold the Ctrl and click the link to skip handle the link.
HandleLinkDomainDesc: If you are in private server, you should change this, otherwise, keep it default.
GrantOsuAccountDesc:
Grant osu! account, then you can download beatmaps by officially, just like osu!direct.
NOTICE: If you are in private server, please don not enable this.
NotGrantOsuAccountButUseOfficialWarn: WARNING: You are NOT grant osu! account but using official download! The download task will AUTO CANCELLED!
